page.title: 02THE LOCAL AREA II
page.content: { (Presbyterians to Helen's Bay or Ballyrobert and Roman Catholics to Holywood). There are three educational establishments in our area:- {ROCKPORT PREPARATORY SCHOOL { }a private day and boarding school for boys and girls aged from 4 to 13. {GLENCRAIG PRIMARY SCHOOL a state school for boys and girls aged from 5 to 11+. {GLENCRAIG COMMUNITY a privately run community for mentally handicapped children and adults. There are no ordinary shops within our area, but there is a sub-post office and general store just along the road.
